pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Dino Charge (2015, TV show)

Obtained by having an empty leg slot and with the $(l:dino_charge/items/dino_chargers#tyrannosaurus_rex_dino_charger)T-Rex Charger$(/l) in the Main Hand and the $(l:dino_charge/arsenal/dino_charge_morpher)Dino Charge Morpher$(/l) in your Off Hand.
